trans-unit.source: Binary operators except “.” and “−>” should be separated from their operands by one space. Unary operators and subscripts are not separated from their operands by spaces:
trans-unit.target: 二元运算符，“”除外 . ”和“ −> ”应与其操作数分开一个空格。一元运算符和下标不会与操作数之间用空格分隔：

trans-unit.source: Binds worker processes to the sets of CPUs. Each CPU set is represented by a bitmask of allowed CPUs. There should be a separate set defined for each of the worker processes. By default, worker processes are not bound to any specific CPUs.
trans-unit.target: 将工作进程绑定到CPU集上。每个CPU集由一个允许的CPU的位掩码表示。应该为每个工作进程定义一个单独的集。默认情况下,工作进程不绑定到任何特定的CPU上。

trans-unit.source: Both cache types can be used simultaneously, for example:
trans-unit.target: 例如,两种缓存类型可以同时使用。

trans-unit.source: Both functions - ngx_http_internal_redirect(r, uri, args) and ngx_http_named_location(r, name) can be called when nginx modules have already stored some contexts in a request's ctx field. It's possible for these contexts to become inconsistent with the new location configuration. To prevent inconsistency, all request contexts are erased by both redirect functions.
trans-unit.target: 当nginx模块已经将某些上下文存储在请求的 ctx 字段中时 ngx_http_named_location(r, name) 可以调用 ngx_http_internal_redirect(r, uri, args) 和ngx_http_named_location（r，name）这两个函数。这些上下文可能与新的位置配置不一致。为了避免不一致，两个重定向功能都会擦除所有请求上下文。

trans-unit.source: Browsers usually store intermediate certificates which they receive and which are signed by trusted authorities, so actively used browsers may already have the required intermediate certificates and may not complain about a certificate sent without a chained bundle. To ensure the server sends the complete certificate chain, the openssl command-line utility may be used, for example:
trans-unit.target: 浏览器通常存储接收到的并由受信任的权威机构签名的中间证书，因此活跃使用的浏览器可能已经具有所需的中间证书，并且可能不会抱怨没有链式捆绑包发送的证书。为了确保服务器发送完整的证书链，可以使用 openssl 命令行实用程序，例如：

trans-unit.source: Buffering can also be enabled or disabled by passing “yes” or “no” in the “X-Accel-Buffering” response header field. This capability can be disabled using the fastcgi_ignore_headers directive.

trans-unit.source: Buffering can also be enabled or disabled by passing “yes” or “no” in the “X-Accel-Buffering” response header field. This capability can be disabled using the proxy_ignore_headers directive.
trans-unit.target: 也可以通过在“ X-Accel-Buffering”响应头字段中传递“ yes ”或“ no ” 来启用或禁用缓冲。可以使用proxy_ignore_headers指令禁用此功能。

trans-unit.source: Buffering can also be enabled or disabled by passing “yes” or “no” in the “X-Accel-Buffering” response header field. This capability can be disabled using the scgi_ignore_headers directive.
trans-unit.target: 也可以通过在“ X-Accel-Buffering”响应头字段中传递“ yes ”或“ no ” 来启用或禁用缓冲。可以使用scgi_ignore_headers指令禁用此功能。

trans-unit.source: Buffering can also be enabled or disabled by passing “yes” or “no” in the “X-Accel-Buffering” response header field. This capability can be disabled using the uwsgi_ignore_headers directive.
trans-unit.target: 也可以通过在“ X-Accel-Buffering”响应头字段中传递“ yes ”或“ no ” 来启用或禁用缓冲。可以使用uwsgi_ignore_headers指令禁用此功能。

trans-unit.source: Buffering of a client request body cannot be disabled regardless of proxy_request_buffering, fastcgi_request_buffering, uwsgi_request_buffering, and scgi_request_buffering directive values.
trans-unit.target: 无论proxy_request_buffering，fastcgi_request_buffering，uwsgi_request_buffering和scgi_request_buffering指令值如何，都不能禁用客户端请求主体的缓冲。

trans-unit.source: Bugfix: getting the parent property of the main HTTP Request object caused a segmentation fault.
trans-unit.target: 错误修正：获取主HTTP请求对象的parent属性导致分段错误。

trans-unit.source: Bugfix: global and function scopes have been fixed.
trans-unit.target: 错误修正:全局和函数作用域已被修正。

trans-unit.source: Bugfix: global variables were not initialized when njs was used in nginx.
trans-unit.target: 修正:在nginx中使用njs时,全局变量没有被初始化。

trans-unit.source: Bugfix: handling int overflow in njs_array_alloc() on 32bit archs.
trans-unit.target: 错误修正：处理32位元拱上的 njs_array_alloc() 中的 int溢出。

trans-unit.source: Bugfix: improved editline detection.
trans-unit.target: 错误修正：改进了 editline 检测。

trans-unit.source: Bugfix: in Object.isSealed().
trans-unit.target: 错误修正：在 Object.isSealed() 中。

trans-unit.source: Bugfix: in parseInt() and Date.parse().
trans-unit.target: 错误修正：在 parseInt() 和 Date.parse() 中。

trans-unit.source: Bugfix: making a subrequest from a Reply object caused a segmentation fault.
trans-unit.target: 错误修正：从 Reply 对象发出子请求会导致分段错误。

trans-unit.source: Bugfix: miscellaneous bugs and segmentation faults have been fixed.
trans-unit.target: 错误修正:修复了杂项错误和分段错误。

trans-unit.source: Bugfix: miscellaneous bugs have been fixed in the core and interactive shell.
trans-unit.target: 错误修正:核心和交互式外壳中的杂项错误已经修正。

trans-unit.source: Bugfix: miscellaneous bugs have been fixed.
trans-unit.target: 错误修正:已经修复了杂七杂八的错误。

trans-unit.source: Bugfix: now for-in loop does not discard the last value of property variable.
trans-unit.target: 错误修正：现在 for-in 循环不会丢弃属性变量的最后一个值。

trans-unit.source: Bugfix: processing of large array indexes.
trans-unit.target: 错误修正:大数组索引的处理。

trans-unit.source: Bugfix: processing of large files from stdin in command line mode.
trans-unit.target: 错误修正：在命令行模式下处理来自 stdin 的大文件。

trans-unit.source: Bugfix: respecting the enumerable attribute while iterating by for in.
trans-unit.target: 错误修正:在通过for in进行迭代时尊重可枚举属性。

trans-unit.source: Bugfix: respecting writable attribute for property handlers.
trans-unit.target: 错误修正:尊重属性处理程序的可写属性。

trans-unit.source: Bugfix: throwing TypeError for attempts to change frozen properties.
trans-unit.target: 错误修正：抛出 TypeError 以尝试更改冻结的属性。

trans-unit.source: But if these directives are put inside the “/download/” location, the last flag should be replaced by break, or otherwise nginx will make 10 cycles and return the 500 error:
trans-unit.target: 但是，如果将这些指令放在“ /download/ ”位置，则 last 标志应由 break 替换，否则nginx将进行10个循环并返回500错误：

trans-unit.source: By default no parameters are set, and therefore DHE ciphers will not be used.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下,没有设置任何参数,因此不会使用DHE密码。

trans-unit.source: By default, a FastCGI server will close a connection right after sending the response. However, when this directive is set to the value on, nginx will instruct a FastCGI server to keep connections open. This is necessary, in particular, for keepalive connections to FastCGI servers to function.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，FastCGI服务器将在发送响应后立即关闭连接。但是，当此指令设置为 on 时，nginx将指示FastCGI服务器保持连接打开。尤其是要使与FastCGI服务器的保持活动连接正常运行，这是必需的。

trans-unit.source: By default, connections are distributed between the servers using a weighted round-robin balancing method. In the above example, each 7 connections will be distributed as follows: 5 connections go to backend1.example.com:12345 and one connection to each of the second and third servers. If an error occurs during communication with a server, the connection will be passed to the next server, and so on until all of the functioning servers will be tried. If communication with all servers fails, the connection will be closed.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，使用加权循环平衡方法在服务器之间分配连接。在上面的示例中，每7个连接将如下分配：5个连接转到 backend1.example.com:12345 ，一个连接到第二个和第三个服务器。如果在与服务器通信期间发生错误，则连接将被传递到下一个服务器，依此类推，直到尝试所有正常运行的服务器为止。如果与所有服务器的通信失败，则连接将关闭。

trans-unit.source: By default, filter modules are placed before the ngx_http_copy_filter in the module list so that the filter handler is executed after the copy filter handler. For other module types the default is the empty string.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，过滤器模块位于模块列表中的 ngx_http_copy_filter 之前，以便在复制过滤器处理程序之后执行过滤器处理程序。对于其他模块类型，默认值为空字符串。

trans-unit.source: By default, multi-threading is disabled, it should be enabled with the --with-threads configuration parameter. Currently, multi-threading is compatible only with the epoll, kqueue, and eventport methods. Multi-threaded sending of files is only supported on Linux.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，禁用多线程，应使用 --with-threads 配置参数启用它。当前，多线程仅与epoll，kqueue和eventport方法兼容。仅在Linux上支持文件的多线程发送。

trans-unit.source: By default, nginx caches answers using the TTL value of a response. An optional valid parameter allows overriding it:
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，nginx使用响应的TTL值缓存答案。可选的 valid 参数允许覆盖它：

trans-unit.source: By default, nginx caches answers using the TTL value of a response. The optional valid parameter allows overriding it:
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，nginx使用响应的TTL值缓存答案。可选的 valid 参数允许覆盖它：

trans-unit.source: By default, nginx does not pass the header fields “Date”, “Server”, “X-Pad”, and “X-Accel-...” from the response of a proxied server to a client. The proxy_hide_header directive sets additional fields that will not be passed. If, on the contrary, the passing of fields needs to be permitted, the proxy_pass_header directive can be used.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，nginx不会将代理服务器的响应中的标头字段“ Date”，“ Server”，“ X-Pad”和“ X-Accel -...”传递给客户端。该 proxy_hide_header 指令设置不会被通过附加字段。相反，如果需要允许传递字段，则可以使用proxy_pass_header指令。

trans-unit.source: By default, nginx does not pass the header fields “Date”, “Server”, and “X-Accel-...” from the response of a gRPC server to a client. The grpc_hide_header directive sets additional fields that will not be passed. If, on the contrary, the passing of fields needs to be permitted, the grpc_pass_header directive can be used.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，nginx不会将gRPC服务器的响应中的标头字段“日期”，“服务器”和“ X-Accel -...”传递给客户端。该 grpc_hide_header 指令设置不会被通过附加字段。相反，如果需要允许传递字段，则可以使用grpc_pass_header指令。

trans-unit.source: By default, nginx does not pass the header fields “Status” and “X-Accel-...” from the response of a FastCGI server to a client. The fastcgi_hide_header directive sets additional fields that will not be passed. If, on the contrary, the passing of fields needs to be permitted, the fastcgi_pass_header directive can be used.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，nginx不会将FastCGI服务器的响应中的标头字段“状态”和“ X-Accel -...”传递给客户端。该 fastcgi_hide_header 指令设置不会被通过附加字段。相反，如果需要允许传递字段，则可以使用fastcgi_pass_header指令。

trans-unit.source: By default, nginx does not pass the header fields “Status” and “X-Accel-...” from the response of a uwsgi server to a client. The uwsgi_hide_header directive sets additional fields that will not be passed. If, on the contrary, the passing of fields needs to be permitted, the uwsgi_pass_header directive can be used.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，nginx不会将uwsgi服务器的响应中的标头字段“ Status”和“ X-Accel -...”传递给客户端。该 uwsgi_hide_header 指令设置不会被通过附加字段。相反，如果需要允许传递字段，则可以使用uwsgi_pass_header指令。

trans-unit.source: By default, nginx does not pass the header fields “Status” and “X-Accel-...” from the response of an SCGI server to a client. The scgi_hide_header directive sets additional fields that will not be passed. If, on the contrary, the passing of fields needs to be permitted, the scgi_pass_header directive can be used.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，nginx不会从SCGI服务器的响应向客户端传递标头字段“状态”和“ X-Accel -...”。该 scgi_hide_header 指令设置不会被通过附加字段。相反，如果需要允许传递字段，则可以使用scgi_pass_header指令。

trans-unit.source: By default, nginx removes all environment variables inherited from its parent process except the TZ variable. This directive allows preserving some of the inherited variables, changing their values, or creating new environment variables. These variables are then:
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下,除了TZ变量,nginx删除了所有从父进程继承的环境变量。这条指令允许保留一些继承的变量,改变它们的值,或者创建新的环境变量。然后,这些变量将被。

trans-unit.source: By default, nginx removes all environment variables inherited from its parent process except the TZ variable. Use the env directive to preserve some of the inherited variables.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，nginx会删除从其父进程继承的所有环境变量（TZ变量除外）。使用env指令保留一些继承的变量。

trans-unit.source: By default, nginx will look up both IPv4 and IPv6 addresses while resolving. If looking up of IPv6 addresses is not desired, the ipv6=off parameter can be specified.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，nginx在解析时将同时查找IPv4和IPv6地址。如果不需要查找IPv6地址，则可以指定 ipv6=off 参数。

trans-unit.source: By default, requests are distributed between the servers using a weighted round-robin balancing method. In the above example, each 7 requests will be distributed as follows: 5 requests go to backend1.example.com and one request to each of the second and third servers. If an error occurs during communication with a server, the request will be passed to the next server, and so on until all of the functioning servers will be tried. If a successful response could not be obtained from any of the servers, the client will receive the result of the communication with the last server.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，使用加权循环平衡方法在服务器之间分配请求。在上面的示例中，每7个请求将如下分配：5个请求转到 backend1.example.com ，一个请求发送到第二个和第三个服务器。如果在与服务器通信期间发生错误，该请求将被传递到下一个服务器，依此类推，直到尝试所有正常运行的服务器为止。如果无法从任何一台服务器获得成功的响应，则客户端将收到与最后一台服务器的通信结果。

trans-unit.source: By default, status information is output in the JSON format.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下,状态信息以JSON格式输出。

trans-unit.source: By default, the buffer size is 16k, which corresponds to minimal overhead when sending big responses. To minimize Time To First Byte it may be beneficial to use smaller values, for example:
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下,缓冲区大小为 16k,相当于发送大的响应时的最小开销。为了最大限度地减少 "首字节时间",使用较小的值可能是有益的,例如。

trans-unit.source: By default, the connection will be closed if the proxied server does not transmit any data within 60 seconds. This timeout can be increased with the proxy_read_timeout directive. Alternatively, the proxied server can be configured to periodically send WebSocket ping frames to reset the timeout and check if the connection is still alive.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，如果代理服务器在60秒内未传输任何数据，则连接将关闭。可以使用proxy_read_timeout指令来增加此超时时间。或者，可以将代理服务器配置为定期发送WebSocket ping帧以重置超时并检查连接是否仍然有效。

trans-unit.source: By default, the directive’s value is close to the string
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，指令的值接近字符串

trans-unit.source: By default, the header field is removed as contents of the response are modified during processing and may contain dynamically generated elements or parts that are changed independently of the original response.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下,头字段会被删除,因为响应的内容在处理过程中被修改,并且可能包含动态生成的元素或部分,这些元素或部分是独立于原始响应而改变的。

trans-unit.source: By default, the header field is removed as contents of the response are modified during processing.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下,由于响应的内容在处理过程中会被修改,所以头字段会被删除。

trans-unit.source: By default, the header field is removed as contents of the response are modified during transformations and may contain dynamically generated elements or parts that are changed independently of the original response.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下,头字段会被删除,因为响应的内容在转换过程中会被修改,并且可能包含动态生成的元素或部分,这些元素或部分会独立于原始响应而改变。

trans-unit.source: Cached data that are not accessed during the time specified by the inactive parameter get removed from the cache regardless of their freshness. By default, inactive is set to 10 minutes.
trans-unit.target: 在 inactive 参数指定的时间内未访问的缓存数据，无论其新鲜度如何，都将从缓存中删除。默认情况下， inactive 设置为10分钟。

trans-unit.source: Caching of errors should be enabled separately by the open_file_cache_errors directive.
trans-unit.target: 错误缓存应该由open_file_cache_errors指令单独启用。

trans-unit.source: Calculates the HMAC digest of all of the data passed using hmac.update(). The encoding can be hex, base64, and base64url. If encoding is not provided, a byte string is returned.
trans-unit.target: 计算使用 hmac.update() 传递的所有数据的HMAC摘要。编码可以是 hex ， base64 和 base64url 。如果未提供编码，则返回字节字符串。

trans-unit.source: Calculates the digest of all of the data passed using hash.update(). The encoding can be hex, base64, and base64url. If encoding is not provided, a byte string is returned.
trans-unit.target: 计算使用 hash.update() 传递的所有数据的摘要。编码可以是 hex ， base64 和 base64url 。如果未提供编码，则返回字节字符串。

trans-unit.source: Calling ngx_http_internal_redirect(r, uri, args) or ngx_http_named_location(r, name) increases the request count. For consistent request reference counting, call ngx_http_finalize_request(r, NGX_DONE) after redirecting the request. This will finalize current request code path and decrease the counter.
trans-unit.target: 调用 ngx_http_internal_redirect(r, uri, args) 或 ngx_http_named_location(r, name) 增加请求 count 。为了保持一致的请求引用计数，请在重定向请求后调用 ngx_http_finalize_request(r, NGX_DONE) 。这将最终确定当前的请求代码路径并减少计数器。

trans-unit.source: Chain links (ngx_chain_t) are actively used in nginx, so the nginx pool implementation provides a way to reuse them. The chain field of ngx_pool_t keeps a list of previously allocated links ready for reuse. For efficient allocation of a chain link in a pool, use the ngx_alloc_chain_link(pool) function. This function looks up a free chain link in the pool list and allocates a new chain link if the pool list is empty. To free a link, call the ngx_free_chain(pool, cl) function.
trans-unit.target: 链链接（ ngx_chain_t ）在nginx中得到积极使用，因此nginx池实现提供了一种重用它们的方法。 ngx_pool_t 的 chain 字段保留了先前分配的链接列表，以供重用。为了在池中有效分配链链接，请使用 ngx_alloc_chain_link(pool) 函数。此功能在池列表中查找自由链链接，如果池列表为空，则分配新的链链接。要释放链接，请调用 ngx_free_chain(pool, cl) 函数。

trans-unit.source: Checks the existence of files in the specified order and uses the first found file for request processing; the processing is performed in the current context. The path to a file is constructed from the file parameter according to the root and alias directives. It is possible to check directory’s existence by specifying a slash at the end of a name, e.g. “$uri/”. If none of the files were found, an internal redirect to the uri specified in the last parameter is made. For example:
trans-unit.target: 按指定顺序检查文件是否存在，并使用找到的第一个文件进行请求处理；该处理在当前上下文中执行。文件的路径是根据根和别名指令从 file 参数构造的。可以通过在名称末尾指定斜杠来检查目录的存在，例如“ $uri/ ”。如果未找到任何文件，则进行内部重定向到最后一个参数中指定的 uri 。例如：

trans-unit.source: Choosing an index file:
trans-unit.target: 选择一个索引文件。

trans-unit.source: Cleanup handlers can be registered in a pool. A cleanup handler is a callback with an argument which is called when pool is destroyed. A pool is usually tied to a specific nginx object (like an HTTP request) and is destroyed when the object reaches the end of its lifetime. Registering a pool cleanup is a convenient way to release resources, close file descriptors or make final adjustments to the shared data associated with the main object.
trans-unit.target: 清理处理程序可以在池中注册。清理处理程序是一个带有参数的回调,当池被销毁时,回调会被调用。一个池通常被绑定到一个特定的nginx对象上(比如一个HTTP请求),当这个对象的寿命结束时,就会被销毁。注册一个池清理是释放资源、关闭文件描述符或对与主对象相关联的共享数据进行最后调整的便捷方式。

trans-unit.source: Client access limitation before actual data processing. The ngx_stream_access_module module is invoked at this phase.
trans-unit.target: 实际数据处理之前的客户端访问限制。该ngx_stream_access_module模块在这个阶段被调用。

trans-unit.source: Configures the “TCP keepalive” behavior for outgoing connections to a FastCGI server. By default, the operating system’s settings are in effect for the socket. If the directive is set to the value “on”, the SO_KEEPALIVE socket option is turned on for the socket.

trans-unit.source: Converts an njs object back to JSON. The obligatory value parameter is generally a JSON object or array that will be converted. If the value has a toJSON() method, it defines how the object will be serialized. The optional replacer parameter is a function or array that transforms results. The optional space parameter is a string or number. If it is a number, it indicates the number of white spaces placed before a result (no more than 10). If it is a string, it is used as a white space (or first 10 characters of it). If omitted or is null, no white space is used.
trans-unit.target: 将njs对象转换回JSON。必填 value 参数通常是将要转换的JSON object 或 array 。如果该值具有 toJSON() 方法，则它定义如何序列化对象。可选的 replacer 参数是转换结果的 function 或 array 。可选的 space 参数是 string 或 number 。如果是 number ，则表示结果前放置的空格数（不超过10）。如果是 string ，它用作空白（或其前10个字符）。如果省略或为 null ，则不使用空格。

trans-unit.source: Defines a string with variables from which the checksum value and lifetime of a link will be extracted.
trans-unit.target: 定义一个包含变量的字符串,从中提取链接的校验值和寿命。

trans-unit.source: Defines a timeout for establishing a connection with a FastCGI server. It should be noted that this timeout cannot usually exceed 75 seconds.
trans-unit.target: 定义与FastCGI服务器建立连接的超时时间。需要注意的是,这个超时时间通常不能超过75秒。

trans-unit.source: Defines a timeout for establishing a connection with a gRPC server. It should be noted that this timeout cannot usually exceed 75 seconds.
trans-unit.target: 定义与gRPC服务器建立连接的超时时间。需要注意的是,这个超时时间通常不能超过75秒。

trans-unit.source: Defines a timeout for establishing a connection with a memcached server. It should be noted that this timeout cannot usually exceed 75 seconds.
trans-unit.target: 定义与memcached服务器建立连接的超时时间。需要注意的是,这个超时时间通常不能超过75秒。

trans-unit.source: Defines a timeout for establishing a connection with a proxied server.
trans-unit.target: 定义与代理服务器建立连接的超时时间。

trans-unit.source: Defines a timeout for establishing a connection with a proxied server. It should be noted that this timeout cannot usually exceed 75 seconds.
trans-unit.target: 定义与代理服务器建立连接的超时时间。需要注意的是,这个超时时间通常不能超过75秒。

trans-unit.source: Defines a timeout for establishing a connection with a uwsgi server. It should be noted that this timeout cannot usually exceed 75 seconds.
trans-unit.target: 定义与wsgi服务器建立连接的超时。需要注意的是,这个超时时间通常不能超过75秒。

trans-unit.source: Defines a timeout for establishing a connection with an SCGI server. It should be noted that this timeout cannot usually exceed 75 seconds.
trans-unit.target: 定义与SCGI服务器建立连接的超时时间。需要注意的是,这个超时时间通常不能超过75秒。

trans-unit.source: Defines a timeout for establishing a connection with another cluster node.
trans-unit.target: 定义与另一个集群节点建立连接的超时。

trans-unit.source: Defines a timeout for reading a response from the FastCGI server. The timeout is set only between two successive read operations, not for the transmission of the whole response. If the FastCGI server does not transmit anything within this time, the connection is closed.
trans-unit.target: 定义从FastCGI服务器读取响应的超时。超时仅在两个连续的读取操作之间设置,而不是针对整个响应的传输。如果FastCGI服务器在此时间内没有传输任何内容,则连接关闭。

trans-unit.source: Defines a timeout for reading a response from the SCGI server. The timeout is set only between two successive read operations, not for the transmission of the whole response. If the SCGI server does not transmit anything within this time, the connection is closed.
trans-unit.target: 定义从SCGI服务器读取响应的超时。超时只在两个连续的读取操作之间设置,而不是针对整个响应的传输。如果SCGI服务器在这段时间内没有传输任何东西,连接就会被关闭。

trans-unit.source: Defines a timeout for reading a response from the gRPC server. The timeout is set only between two successive read operations, not for the transmission of the whole response. If the gRPC server does not transmit anything within this time, the connection is closed.
trans-unit.target: 定义从gRPC服务器读取响应的超时。超时只在两个连续的读取操作之间设置,而不是针对整个响应的传输。如果gRPC服务器在这段时间内没有传输任何内容,连接就会被关闭。

trans-unit.source: Defines a timeout for reading a response from the memcached server. The timeout is set only between two successive read operations, not for the transmission of the whole response. If the memcached server does not transmit anything within this time, the connection is closed.
trans-unit.target: 定义从memcached服务器读取响应的超时。超时只在两个连续的读取操作之间设置,而不是针对整个响应的传输。如果memcached服务器在这段时间内没有传输任何内容,连接就会被关闭。

trans-unit.source: Defines a timeout for reading a response from the proxied server. The timeout is set only between two successive read operations, not for the transmission of the whole response. If the proxied server does not transmit anything within this time, the connection is closed.
trans-unit.target: 定义从代理服务器读取响应的超时。超时只在两个连续的读取操作之间设置,而不是针对整个响应的传输。如果代理服务器在这个时间内没有传输任何东西,连接就会被关闭。

trans-unit.source: Defines a timeout for reading a response from the uwsgi server. The timeout is set only between two successive read operations, not for the transmission of the whole response. If the uwsgi server does not transmit anything within this time, the connection is closed.
trans-unit.target: 定义从wsgi服务器读取响应的超时。超时只在两个连续的读取操作之间设置,而不是针对整个响应的传输。如果uwsgi服务器在这个时间内没有传输任何东西,连接就会被关闭。

trans-unit.source: Defines a timeout for reading client request body. The timeout is set only for a period between two successive read operations, not for the transmission of the whole request body. If a client does not transmit anything within this time, the request is terminated with the 408 (Request Time-out) error.
trans-unit.target: 定义读取客户端请求体的超时。超时只针对两个连续读取操作之间的时间段,而不是针对整个请求体的传输。如果客户端在这段时间内没有传输任何内容,则请求会以408(请求超时)错误终止。

trans-unit.source: Defines a timeout for reading client request header. If a client does not transmit the entire header within this time, the request is terminated with the 408 (Request Time-out) error.
trans-unit.target: 定义读取客户端请求头的超时时间。如果客户端没有在这个时间内传输整个头,请求就会以408(请求超时)错误终止。

trans-unit.source: Defines an expression for which the MD5 hash value will be computed and compared with the value passed in a request.
trans-unit.target: 定义一个表达式,计算MD5哈希值并与请求中传递的值进行比较。

trans-unit.source: Defines an interval between connection attempts to another cluster node.
trans-unit.target: 定义到另一个群集节点的连接尝试之间的时间间隔。

trans-unit.source: Defines an interval for polling updates in a shared memory zone.
trans-unit.target: 定义共享内存区中轮询更新的时间间隔。

trans-unit.source: Defines conditions under which the request will be considered a cache purge request. If at least one value of the string parameters is not empty and is not equal to “0” then the cache entry with a corresponding cache key is removed. The result of successful operation is indicated by returning the 204 (No Content) response.
trans-unit.target: 定义将请求视为高速缓存清除请求的条件。如果字符串参数中的至少一个值不为空且不等于“ 0”，则将删除具有相应缓存键的缓存条目。通过返回204（无内容）响应来指示成功操作的结果。

trans-unit.source: Defines conditions under which the request will be considered a cache purge request. If at least one value of the string parameters is not empty and is not equal to “0” then the cache entry with a corresponding cache key is removed. The result of successful operation is indicated by returning the 204 (No Content) response.
trans-unit.target: 定义将请求视为高速缓存清除请求的条件。如果字符串参数中的至少一个值不为空且不等于“ 0”，则将删除具有相应缓存键的缓存条目。通过返回204（无内容）响应来指示成功操作的结果。

trans-unit.source: Defines conditions under which the request will be considered a cache purge request. If at least one value of the string parameters is not empty and is not equal to “0” then the cache entry with a corresponding cache key is removed. The result of successful operation is indicated by returning the 204 (No Content) response.
trans-unit.target: 定义将请求视为高速缓存清除请求的条件。如果字符串参数中的至少一个值不为空且不等于“ 0”，则将删除具有相应缓存键的缓存条目。通过返回204（无内容）响应来指示成功操作的结果。

trans-unit.source: Defines conditions under which the request will be considered a cache purge request. If at least one value of the string parameters is not empty and is not equal to “0” then the cache entry with a corresponding cache key is removed. The result of successful operation is indicated by returning the 204 (No Content) response.
trans-unit.target: 定义将请求视为高速缓存清除请求的条件。如果字符串参数中的至少一个值不为空且不等于“ 0”，则将删除具有相应缓存键的缓存条目。通过返回204（无内容）响应来指示成功操作的结果。

trans-unit.source: Defines conditions under which the response will not be saved to a cache. If at least one value of the string parameters is not empty and is not equal to “0” then the response will not be saved:
trans-unit.target: 定义不将响应保存到缓存的条件。如果字符串参数的至少一个值不为空且不等于“ 0”，则将不保存响应：

trans-unit.source: Defines conditions under which the response will not be taken from a cache. If at least one value of the string parameters is not empty and is not equal to “0” then the response will not be taken from the cache:
trans-unit.target: 定义不从缓存获取响应的条件。如果字符串参数中的至少一个值不为空且不等于“ 0”，则不会从缓存中获取响应：

trans-unit.source: Defines files that will be used as an index. The file name can contain variables. Files are checked in the specified order. The last element of the list can be a file with an absolute path. Example:
trans-unit.target: 定义将用作索引的文件。该 file 名可以包含变量。文件以指定顺序检查。列表的最后一个元素可以是具有绝对路径的文件。例：

trans-unit.source: Defines named thread pools used for multi-threaded reading and sending of files without blocking worker processes.
trans-unit.target: 定义用于多线程读取和发送文件而不会阻塞工作进程的命名线程池。

trans-unit.source: Defines the address and other parameters of a server. The address can be specified as a domain name or IP address with an obligatory port, or as a UNIX-domain socket path specified after the “unix:” prefix. A domain name that resolves to several IP addresses defines multiple servers at once.
trans-unit.target: 定义服务器的 address 和其他 parameters 。该地址可以指定为带有强制端口的域名或IP地址，也可以指定为在“ unix: ”前缀之后指定的UNIX域套接字路径。解析为多个IP地址的域名一次定义了多个服务器。

trans-unit.source: Defines the address and other parameters of a server. The address can be specified as a domain name or IP address, with an optional port, or as a UNIX-domain socket path specified after the “unix:” prefix. If a port is not specified, the port 80 is used. A domain name that resolves to several IP addresses defines multiple servers at once.
trans-unit.target: 定义服务器的 address 和其他 parameters 。该地址可以指定为域名或IP地址，可选端口，也可以指定为在“ unix: ”前缀之后指定的UNIX域套接字路径。如果未指定端口，则使用端口80。解析为多个IP地址的域名一次定义了多个服务器。

trans-unit.source: Defines the address of a cluster node. The address can be specified as a domain name or IP address with a mandatory port, or as a UNIX-domain socket path specified after the “unix:” prefix. A domain name that resolves to several IP addresses defines multiple nodes at once.
trans-unit.target: 定义集群节点的 address 。该地址可以指定为带有必需端口的域名或IP地址，也可以指定为在“ unix: ”前缀之后指定的UNIX域套接字路径。解析为多个IP地址的域名一次定义了多个节点。

trans-unit.source: Defines the domain for which the cookie is set. Parameter value can contain variables (1.11.5).
trans-unit.target: 定义为其设置cookie 的 domain 。参数值可以包含变量（1.11.5）。

trans-unit.source: Defines the name and size of the shared memory zone that keeps the group’s configuration and run-time state that are shared between worker processes. Several groups may share the same zone. In this case, it is enough to specify the size only once.
trans-unit.target: 定义共享内存区域的 name 和 size ，以保留工作进程之间共享的组的配置和运行时状态。几个组可以共享同一区域。在这种情况下，仅指定一次 size 就足够了。

trans-unit.source: Defines the path for which the cookie is set.
trans-unit.target: 定义设置cookie 的 path 。

trans-unit.source: Defines the URI that will be shown for the specified errors. A uri value can contain variables.
trans-unit.target: 定义将为指定错误显示的URI。一个 uri 值可以包含变量。

trans-unit.source: Defines the XSLT stylesheet and its optional parameters. A stylesheet is compiled at the configuration stage.
trans-unit.target: 定义XSLT样式表和它的可选参数。样式表在配置阶段被编译。

trans-unit.source: Defines the address of a syslog server. The address can be specified as a domain name or IP address, with an optional port, or as a UNIX-domain socket path specified after the “unix:” prefix. If port is not specified, the UDP port 514 is used. If a domain name resolves to several IP addresses, the first resolved address is used.
trans-unit.target: 定义系统日志服务器的地址。该地址可以指定为域名或IP地址，可选端口，也可以指定为在“ unix: ”前缀之后指定的UNIX域套接字路径。如果未指定端口，则使用UDP端口514。如果域名解析为多个IP地址，则使用第一个解析的地址。

trans-unit.source: Defines the current working directory for a worker process. It is primarily used when writing a core-file, in which case a worker process should have write permission for the specified directory.
trans-unit.target: 定义工作进程的当前工作目录。它主要用于编写核心文件时,在这种情况下,工作进程应该有指定目录的写权限。

trans-unit.source: Defines the default MIME type of a response. Mapping of file name extensions to MIME types can be set with the types directive.
trans-unit.target: 定义响应的默认MIME类型。可以使用types指令设置文件扩展名到MIME类型的映射。

trans-unit.source: Defines the default fragment length for playlist URIs requested without the “len” argument.
trans-unit.target: 为没有“ len ”参数的请求的播放列表URI定义默认片段长度。

trans-unit.source: Defines the name of a module that will be loaded during each reconfiguration. Several perl_require directives can be present.
trans-unit.target: 定义将在每次重新配置期间加载的模块的名称。可以存在几个 perl_require 指令。

trans-unit.source: Defines the name of the hardware SSL accelerator.
trans-unit.target: 定义硬件SSL加速器的名称。

trans-unit.source: Defines the named test set used to verify responses to health check requests.
trans-unit.target: 定义用于验证健康检查请求响应的命名测试集。

trans-unit.source: Defines the named test set used to verify server responses to health checks.
trans-unit.target: 定义用于验证服务器对健康检查的响应的命名测试集。

trans-unit.source: Defines the number of worker processes.
trans-unit.target: 定义工人进程的数量。

trans-unit.source: Defines the parameters for XSLT stylesheets. The value is treated as an XPath expression. The value can contain variables. To pass a string value to a stylesheet, the xslt_string_param directive can be used.
trans-unit.target: 定义XSLT样式表的参数。该 value 被视为XPath表达式。该 value 可以包含变量。要将字符串值传递给样式表，可以使用xslt_string_param指令。

trans-unit.source: Defines the request header field whose value will be used to replace the client address.
trans-unit.target: 定义请求头字段,其值将用于替换客户端地址。

trans-unit.source: Defines the scheduling priority for worker processes like it is done by the nice command: a negative number means higher priority. Allowed range normally varies from -20 to 20.
trans-unit.target: 限定用于工作进程的调度优先级等它是由完成 nice 命令：负 number 的装置更高的优先级。允许范围通常为-20到20。

trans-unit.source: Defines the source charset of a response. If this charset is different from the charset specified in the charset directive, a conversion is performed.
trans-unit.target: 定义响应的源字符集。如果此字符集与charset指令中指定的字符集不同，则执行转换。

trans-unit.source: Defines the string parameters for XSLT stylesheets. XPath expressions in the value are not interpreted. The value can contain variables.
trans-unit.target: 定义XSLT样式表的字符串参数。该 value 中的XPath表达式不会被解释。该 value 可以包含变量。

trans-unit.source: Defines trusted addresses that are known to send correct replacement addresses. If the special value unix: is specified, all UNIX-domain sockets will be trusted.
trans-unit.target: 定义已知可发送正确替换地址的可信地址。如果指定了特殊值 unix: ，将信任所有UNIX域套接字。

trans-unit.source: Defines trusted addresses that are known to send correct replacement addresses. If the special value unix: is specified, all UNIX-domain sockets will be trusted. Trusted addresses may also be specified using a hostname (1.13.1).
trans-unit.target: 定义已知可发送正确替换地址的可信地址。如果指定了特殊值 unix: ，将信任所有UNIX域套接字。也可以使用主机名（1.13.1）指定受信任的地址。

trans-unit.source: Defines trusted addresses. When a request comes from a trusted address, an address from the “X-Forwarded-For” request header field will be used instead.
trans-unit.target: 定义可信地址。当请求来自受信任的地址时，将使用“ X-Forwarded-For”请求标头字段中的地址代替。

trans-unit.source: Defines whether transparency should be preserved when transforming GIF images or PNG images with colors specified by a palette. The loss of transparency results in images of a better quality. The alpha channel transparency in PNG is always preserved.
trans-unit.target: 定义在使用调色板指定的颜色转换GIF图像或PNG图像时是否应保留透明度。透明度的损失会导致图像的质量更好。PNG中的alpha通道透明度总是被保留。

trans-unit.source: Deletes all key-value pairs from the HTTP keyval shared memory zone. If synchronization of keyval zones in a cluster is enabled, empties the keyval zone only on a target cluster node.
trans-unit.target: 从HTTP keyval共享内存区域中删除所有键值对。如果在集群中启用了密钥区的同步，则仅在目标集群节点上清空密钥区。

trans-unit.source: Deletes all key-value pairs from the stream keyval shared memory zone. If synchronization of keyval zones in a cluster is enabled, empties the keyval zone only on a target cluster node.
trans-unit.target: 从流keyval共享存储区中删除所有键值对。如果在集群中启用了密钥区的同步，则仅在目标集群节点上清空密钥区。

trans-unit.source: Denies access for the specified network or address. If the special value unix: is specified (1.5.1), denies access for all UNIX-domain sockets.
trans-unit.target: 拒绝访问指定的网络或地址。如果指定特殊值 unix: （1.5.1），则拒绝所有UNIX域套接字的访问。

trans-unit.source: Denies access for the specified network or address. If the special value unix: is specified, denies access for all UNIX-domain sockets.
trans-unit.target: 拒绝访问指定的网络或地址。如果指定了特殊值 unix: ，则拒绝所有UNIX域套接字的访问。

trans-unit.source: Depending on the contents of added keys, you may need to initialize up to three key arrays: one for exact matching (described above), and two more to enable matching starting from the head or tail of a string:
trans-unit.target: 根据添加的键的内容,您可能需要初始化最多三个键数组:一个用于精确匹配(如上所述),另外两个用于从字符串的头或尾开始匹配。

trans-unit.source: Depending on the file size either AES256 (for 80-byte keys, 1.11.8) or AES128 (for 48-byte keys) is used for encryption.
trans-unit.target: 根据文件大小,AES256(80字节密钥,1.11.8)或AES128(48字节密钥)被用于加密。

trans-unit.source: Deprecated members of Request:
trans-unit.target: Request 中已弃用的成员：

trans-unit.source: Deprecated members of Response:
trans-unit.target: 已弃用的 Response 成员：

trans-unit.source: Describes the conversion table from one charset to another. A reverse conversion table is built using the same data. Character codes are given in hexadecimal. Missing characters in the range 80-FF are replaced with “?”. When converting from UTF-8, characters missing in a one-byte charset are replaced with “&#XXXX;”.
trans-unit.target: 描述从一个字符集到另一个字符集的转换表。反向转换表是使用相同的数据构建的。字符代码以十六进制给出。80-FF范围内的缺少字符将替换为“ ? ”。从UTF-8转换时，一字节字符集中缺少的字符将替换为“ &#XXXX; ”。

trans-unit.target: 描述指定变量的值对客户端IP地址的依赖性。默认情况下，地址来自 $remote_addr 变量，但也可以来自另一个变量（0.7.27），例如：

trans-unit.source: Describes the dependency of values of the specified variable on the client IP address. By default, the address is taken from the $remote_addr variable, but it can also be taken from another variable, for example:
trans-unit.target: 描述指定变量的值对客户端IP地址的依赖性。默认情况下，地址来自 $remote_addr 变量，但也可以来自另一个变量，例如：

trans-unit.source: Detailed description of server names is provided in a separate Server names document.
trans-unit.target: 服务器名称的详细说明在单独的服务器名称文档中提供。

trans-unit.source: Determines how symbolic links should be treated when opening files:
trans-unit.target: 确定打开文件时如何处理符号链接。

trans-unit.source: Determines in which cases a stale cached response can be used during communication with the proxied server. The directive’s parameters match the parameters of the proxy_next_upstream directive.
trans-unit.target: 确定在什么情况下可以与代理服务器进行通信时使用陈旧的缓存响应。该指令的参数与proxy_next_upstream指令的参数匹配。

trans-unit.source: Determines in which cases a stale cached response can be used when an error occurs during communication with the FastCGI server. The directive’s parameters match the parameters of the fastcgi_next_upstream directive.
trans-unit.target: 确定在与FastCGI服务器通信期间发生错误时，在什么情况下可以使用过时的缓存响应。伪指令的参数与fastcgi_next_upstream伪指令的参数匹配。

trans-unit.source: Determines in which cases a stale cached response can be used when an error occurs during communication with the SCGI server. The directive’s parameters match the parameters of the scgi_next_upstream directive.
trans-unit.target: 确定在与SCGI服务器通信期间发生错误时在什么情况下可以使用过时的缓存响应。该指令的参数与scgi_next_upstream指令的参数匹配。

trans-unit.source: Determines in which cases a stale cached response can be used when an error occurs during communication with the uwsgi server. The directive’s parameters match the parameters of the uwsgi_next_upstream directive.
trans-unit.target: 确定在与uwsgi服务器通信期间发生错误时，在什么情况下可以使用过时的缓存响应。该指令的参数与uwsgi_next_upstream指令的参数匹配。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether FastCGI server responses with codes greater than or equal to 300 should be passed to a client or be intercepted and redirected to nginx for processing with the error_page directive.
trans-unit.target: 确定是否将具有大于或等于300的代码的FastCGI服务器响应传递给客户端，或者将其拦截并重定向到nginx以使用error_page指令进行处理。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether SSL sessions can be reused when working with a secured uwsgi server. If the errors “SSL3_GET_FINISHED:digest check failed” appear in the logs, try disabling session reuse.
trans-unit.target: 确定在使用受保护的uwsgi服务器时是否可以重用SSL会话。如果日志中出现错误“ SSL3_GET_FINISHED:digest check failed ”，请尝试禁用会话重用。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether SSL sessions can be reused when working with the gRPC server. If the errors “SSL3_GET_FINISHED:digest check failed” appear in the logs, try disabling session reuse.
trans-unit.target: 确定使用gRPC服务器时是否可以重用SSL会话。如果日志中出现错误“ SSL3_GET_FINISHED:digest check failed ”，请尝试禁用会话重用。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether SSL sessions can be reused when working with the proxied server. If the errors “SSL3_GET_FINISHED:digest check failed” appear in the logs, try disabling session reuse.
trans-unit.target: 确定在使用代理服务器时是否可以重用SSL会话。如果日志中出现错误“ SSL3_GET_FINISHED:digest check failed ”，请尝试禁用会话重用。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether a conversion should be performed for answers received from a proxied or a FastCGI/uwsgi/SCGI/gRPC server when the answers already carry a charset in the “Content-Type” response header field. If conversion is enabled, a charset specified in the received response is used as a source charset.
trans-unit.target: 确定当答案已在“ Content-Type”响应标头字段中包含字符集时，是否应该对从代理服务器或FastCGI / uwsgi / SCGI / gRPC服务器接收的答案执行转换。如果启用了转换，则在接收到的响应中指定的字符集将用作源字符集。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether a uwsgi server responses with codes greater than or equal to 300 should be passed to a client or be intercepted and redirected to nginx for processing with the error_page directive.
trans-unit.target: 确定是否应将具有大于或等于300的代码的uwsgi服务器响应传递给客户端，或者应将其拦截并重定向到nginx以使用error_page指令进行处理。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether an SCGI server responses with codes greater than or equal to 300 should be passed to a client or be intercepted and redirected to nginx for processing with the error_page directive.
trans-unit.target: 确定应将SCGI服务器的代码大于或等于300的响应传递给客户端，还是应将其拦截并重定向到nginx以使用error_page指令进行处理。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether gRPC server responses with codes greater than or equal to 300 should be passed to a client or be intercepted and redirected to nginx for processing with the error_page directive.
trans-unit.target: 确定是否将代码大于或等于300的gRPC服务器响应传递给客户端，或者将其拦截并重定向到nginx以使用error_page指令进行处理。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether nginx should become a daemon. Mainly used during development.
trans-unit.target: 决定nginx是否应该成为守护进程。主要用于开发过程中。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether nginx should save the entire client request body in a single buffer. The directive is recommended when using the $request_body variable, to save the number of copy operations involved.
trans-unit.target: 确定nginx是否应将整个客户端请求主体保存在单个缓冲区中。当使用 $request_body 变量时，建议使用该指令，以节省涉及的复制操作的数量。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether nginx should save the entire client request body into a file. This directive can be used during debugging, or when using the $request_body_file variable, or the $r->request_body_file method of the module ngx_http_perl_module.
trans-unit.target: 确定nginx是否应将整个客户端请求主体保存到文件中。此伪指令可以在调试期间使用，也可以在使用 $request_body_file 变量或模块ngx_http_perl_module的$ r-> request_body_file方法时使用。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether proxied responses with codes greater than or equal to 300 should be passed to a client or be intercepted and redirected to nginx for processing with the error_page directive.
trans-unit.target: 确定代码大于或等于300的代理响应应该传递给客户端还是被拦截并重定向到nginx以使用error_page指令进行处理。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the connection with a FastCGI server should be closed when a client closes the connection without waiting for a response.
trans-unit.target: 确定当客户端关闭连接而不等待响应时,是否应该关闭与FastCGI服务器的连接。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the connection with a proxied server should be closed when a client closes the connection without waiting for a response.
trans-unit.target: 确定当客户端不等待响应就关闭连接时,是否应该关闭与代理服务器的连接。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the connection with a uwsgi server should be closed when a client closes the connection without waiting for a response.
trans-unit.target: 确定当客户端不等待响应而关闭连接时,是否应该关闭与wsgi服务器的连接。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the connection with an SCGI server should be closed when a client closes the connection without waiting for a response.
trans-unit.target: 确定当客户端不等待响应而关闭连接时,是否应该关闭与SCGI服务器的连接。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether worker processes are started. This directive is intended for nginx developers.
trans-unit.target: 决定是否启动工作进程。这条指令是为nginx开发者准备的。

trans-unit.source: Disables keep-alive connections with misbehaving browsers. The browser parameters specify which browsers will be affected. The value msie6 disables keep-alive connections with old versions of MSIE, once a POST request is received. The value safari disables keep-alive connections with Safari and Safari-like browsers on macOS and macOS-like operating systems. The value none enables keep-alive connections with all browsers.
trans-unit.target: 禁用行为异常的浏览器的保持活动连接。该 browser 参数指定浏览器会受到影响。收到POST请求后， msie6 值将禁用与旧版本MSIE的保持活动连接。值 safari 禁用与macOS和类似macOS的操作系统上的Safari和类似Safari的浏览器保持活动连接。值 none 启用与所有浏览器的保持活动连接。

trans-unit.source: Disables processing of certain response header fields from the FastCGI server. The following fields can be ignored: “X-Accel-Redirect”, “X-Accel-Expires”, “X-Accel-Limit-Rate” (1.1.6), “X-Accel-Buffering” (1.1.6), “X-Accel-Charset” (1.1.6), “Expires”, “Cache-Control”, “Set-Cookie” (0.8.44), and “Vary” (1.7.7).
trans-unit.target: 禁用FastCGI服务器中某些响应标头字段的处理。可以忽略以下字段：“ X加速重定向”，“ X加速过期”，“ X加速限制速率”（1.1.6），“ X加速缓冲”（1.1.6） ，“ X-Accel-Charset”（1.1.6），“ Expires”，“ Cache-Control”，“ Set-Cookie”（0.8.44）和“ Vary”（1.7.7）。

trans-unit.source: Disables processing of certain response header fields from the SCGI server. The following fields can be ignored: “X-Accel-Redirect”, “X-Accel-Expires”, “X-Accel-Limit-Rate” (1.1.6), “X-Accel-Buffering” (1.1.6), “X-Accel-Charset” (1.1.6), “Expires”, “Cache-Control”, “Set-Cookie” (0.8.44), and “Vary” (1.7.7).
trans-unit.target: 禁用来自SCGI服务器的某些响应头字段的处理。可以忽略以下字段：“ X加速重定向”，“ X加速过期”，“ X加速限制速率”（1.1.6），“ X加速缓冲”（1.1.6） ，“ X-Accel-Charset”（1.1.6），“ Expires”，“ Cache-Control”，“ Set-Cookie”（0.8.44）和“ Vary”（1.7.7）。

trans-unit.source: Each HTTP client connection runs through the following stages:
trans-unit.target: 每个HTTP客户端连接都要经过以下几个阶段。

trans-unit.source: Each HTTP module can have three types of configuration:
trans-unit.target: 每个HTTP模块可以有三种类型的配置。

trans-unit.source: Each HTTP njs handler receives one argument, a request object.
trans-unit.target: 每个HTTP njs处理程序都接收一个参数，即一个请求对象。

trans-unit.source: Each HTTP request passes through a sequence of phases. In each phase a distinct type of processing is performed on the request. Module-specific handlers can be registered in most phases, and many standard nginx modules register their phase handlers as a way to get called at a specific stage of request processing. Phases are processed successively and the phase handlers are called once the request reaches the phase. Following is the list of nginx HTTP phases.
trans-unit.target: 每个HTTP请求都要经过一系列的阶段。在每一个阶段,都会对请求进行不同类型的处理。模块专用的处理程序可以在大多数阶段中注册,许多标准的nginx模块注册了他们的阶段处理程序,作为在请求处理的特定阶段被调用的一种方式。阶段是连续处理的,一旦请求到达阶段,阶段处理程序就会被调用。以下是nginx HTTP阶段的列表。

trans-unit.source: Each chain link keeps a reference to its buffer and a reference to the next chain link.
trans-unit.target: 每个链节都会保留一个对其缓冲区的引用和对下一个链节的引用。

trans-unit.source: Each cluster node should be specified only once.
trans-unit.target: 每个集群节点只能指定一次。

trans-unit.source: Each connection obtained by calling the ngx_get_connection() function has two attached events, c->read and c->write, which are used for receiving notification that the socket is ready for reading or writing. All such events operate in Edge-Triggered mode, meaning that they only trigger notifications when the state of the socket changes. For example, doing a partial read on a socket does not make nginx deliver a repeated read notification until more data arrives on the socket. Even when the underlying I/O notification mechanism is essentially Level-Triggered (poll, select etc), nginx converts the notifications to Edge-Triggered. To make nginx event notifications consistent across all notifications systems on different platforms, the functions ngx_handle_read_event(rev, flags) and ngx_handle_write_event(wev, lowat) must be called after handling an I/O socket notification or calling any I/O functions on that socket. Normally, the functions are called once at the end of each read or write event handler.
trans-unit.target: 通过调用 ngx_get_connection() 函数获得的每个连接都有两个附加事件， c->read 和 c->write ，用于接收套接字已准备好进行读取或写入的通知。所有此类事件均在“边缘触发”模式下运行，这意味着它们仅在套接字状态更改时触发通知。例如，在套接字上进行部分读取不会使nginx传递重复的读取通知，直到更多数据到达套接字。即使底层的I / O通知机制本质上是级别触发的（ poll ， select 等等），nginx会将通知转换为Edge-Triggered。为了使nginx事件通知在不同平台上的所有通知系统之间保持一致 ngx_handle_write_event(wev, lowat) 必须在处理I / O套接字通知或在该套接字上调用任何I / O函数后调用 ngx_handle_read_event(rev, flags) 和ngx_handle_write_event（wev，lowat）函数。通常，在每个读取或写入事件处理程序的末尾调用一次函数。

trans-unit.source: Enables collection of virtual http or stream server status information in the specified zone. Several servers may share the same zone.

trans-unit.source: Enables debugging log for selected client connections. Other connections will use logging level set by the error_log directive. For connections using UNIX-domain sockets (1.3.0, 1.2.1), debugging log is enabled by the “unix:” parameter.
trans-unit.target: 为选定的客户端连接启用调试日志。其他连接将使用error_log指令设置的日志记录级别。调试连接由IPv4或IPv6（1.3.0，1.2.1）地址或网络指定。也可以使用主机名指定连接。对于使用UNIX域套接字（1.3.0，1.2.1）的连接，调试日志通过“ unix: ”参数启用。

trans-unit.source: Enables or disables resetting timed out connections and connections closed with the non-standard code 444 (1.15.2). The reset is performed as follows. Before closing a socket, the SO_LINGER option is set on it with a timeout value of 0. When the socket is closed, TCP RST is sent to the client, and all memory occupied by this socket is released. This helps avoid keeping an already closed socket with filled buffers in a FIN_WAIT1 state for a long time.
trans-unit.target: 启用或禁用重置超时连接和使用非标准代码444（1.15.2）关闭的连接。重置执行如下。关闭套接字之前，将 SO_LINGER 选项设置为超时值0。关闭套接字后，会将TCP RST发送到客户端，并释放该套接字占用的所有内存。这有助于避免将已经关闭且具有已填充缓冲区的套接字长时间保持在FIN_WAIT1状态。

trans-unit.source: Enables or disables the use of the primary server name, specified by the server_name directive, in absolute redirects issued by nginx. When the use of the primary server name is disabled, the name from the “Host” request header field is used. If this field is not present, the IP address of the server is used.

trans-unit.source: Enables terminating all sessions to a proxied server after it was removed from the group or marked as permanently unavailable. This can occur because of re-resolve or with the API DELETE command. A server can be marked as permanently unavailable if it is considered unhealthy or with the API PATCH command. Each session is terminated when the next read or write event is processed for the client or proxied server.
trans-unit.target: 在将代理服务器从组中删除或标记为永久不可用之后，可以终止与代理服务器的所有会话。可能由于重新解析或使用API DELETE 命令而发生。如果服务器不正常或使用API PATCH 命令，则可以将其标记为永久不可用。当为客户端或代理服务器处理下一个读取或写入事件时，每个会话都会终止。

trans-unit.source: Enables the PROXY protocol for connections to a proxied server.

trans-unit.source: Enables the SSL/TLS protocol for connections to another cluster server.
trans-unit.target: 启用SSL/TLS协议以连接到另一个群集服务器。

trans-unit.source: Enables the dry run mode. In this mode, requests processing rate is not limited, however, in the shared memory zone, the number of excessive requests is accounted as usual.
trans-unit.target: 启用干运行模式。在该模式下,请求处理速度不受限制,但在共享内存区,超量请求的数量照常计算。

trans-unit.source: Enables the specified protocols for connections to a proxied server.
trans-unit.target: 启用指定的协议以连接到代理服务器。

trans-unit.source: Enables the specified protocols for connections to another cluster server.
trans-unit.target: 启用指定的协议以连接到另一个群集服务器。

trans-unit.source: Enables the specified protocols for requests to a gRPC SSL server.
trans-unit.target: 启用向gRPC SSL服务器请求的指定协议。

trans-unit.source: Enables the specified protocols for requests to a proxied HTTPS server.
trans-unit.target: 启用向代理HTTPS服务器请求的指定协议。

trans-unit.source: Enables the specified protocols for requests to a secured uwsgi server.
trans-unit.target: 启用指定的协议,以便向安全的Uwsgi服务器发出请求。

trans-unit.source: Enables the specified protocols.
trans-unit.target: 启用指定的协议。

trans-unit.source: Enables the synchronization of shared memory zones between cluster nodes. Cluster nodes are defined using zone_sync_server directives.
trans-unit.target: 启用群集节点之间共享内存区域的同步。群集节点是使用zone_sync_server指令定义的。

trans-unit.source: Enables the test for the flag presence in the memcached server response and sets the “Content-Encoding” response header field to “gzip” if the flag is set.
trans-unit.target: 启用对内存缓存服务器响应中 flag 是否存在的测试，如果设置了标志，则将“ Content-Encoding ”响应标头字段设置为“ gzip ”。

trans-unit.source: Enables the use of the O_DIRECT flag (FreeBSD, Linux), the F_NOCACHE flag (macOS), or the directio() function (Solaris), when reading files that are larger than or equal to the specified size. The directive automatically disables (0.7.15) the use of sendfile for a given request. It can be useful for serving large files:
trans-unit.target: 在读取大于或等于指定 size 文件时，启用 O_DIRECT 标志（FreeBSD，Linux）， F_NOCACHE 标志（macOS）或 directio() 函数（Solaris）的使用。该指令自动针对给定的请求禁用（0.7.15）sendfile。它对于提供大文件很有用：

trans-unit.source: Enables the use of the specified session log. The special value off cancels all session_log directives inherited from the previous configuration level.
trans-unit.target: 启用对指定会话日志的使用。特殊值 off 取消从先前配置级别继承的所有 session_log 指令。

trans-unit.source: Enables transformations in responses with the specified MIME types in addition to “text/xml”. The special value “*” matches any MIME type (0.8.29). If the transformation result is an HTML response, its MIME type is changed to “text/html”.
trans-unit.target: 除了“ text/xml ” 之外，还启用具有指定MIME类型的响应中的转换。特殊值“ * ”与任何MIME类型（0.8.29）匹配。如果转换结果是HTML响应，则其MIME类型更改为“ text/html ”。

trans-unit.source: Enables validation of JSON Web Token. The specified string is used as a realm. Parameter value can contain variables.
trans-unit.target: 启用JSON Web令牌验证。指定的 string 用作 realm 。参数值可以包含变量。

trans-unit.source: Enables validation of user name and password using the “HTTP Basic Authentication” protocol. The specified parameter is used as a realm. Parameter value can contain variables (1.3.10, 1.2.7). The special value off allows cancelling the effect of the auth_basic directive inherited from the previous configuration level.
trans-unit.target: 使用“ HTTP基本认证”协议启用用户名和密码的验证。指定的参数用作 realm 。参数值可以包含变量（1.3.10、1.2.7）。特殊值 off 允许取消从先前配置级别继承的 auth_basic 指令的效果。

trans-unit.source: Enables verification of client certificates. The verification result is passed in the “Auth-SSL-Verify” header of the authentication request.
trans-unit.target: 启用客户端证书的验证。验证结果在身份验证请求的“ Auth-SSL-Verify”标头中传递。

trans-unit.source: Enables verification of client certificates. The verification result is stored in the $ssl_client_verify variable.
trans-unit.target: 启用客户端证书的验证。验证结果存储在$ ssl_client_verify变量中。

trans-unit.source: Enables verification of client certificates. The verification result is stored in the $ssl_client_verify variable. If an error has occurred during the client certificate verification or a client has not presented the required certificate, the connection is closed.
trans-unit.target: 启用客户端证书的验证。验证结果存储在$ ssl_client_verify变量中。如果在客户端证书验证期间发生错误，或者客户端未提供所需的证书，则连接将关闭。

trans-unit.source: Encodes a URI by replacing each instance of certain characters by one, two, three, or four escape sequences representing the UTF-8 encoding of the character
trans-unit.target: 通过用一个、两个、三个或四个转义序列来替换特定字符的每个实例来对URI进行编码,这些转义序列代表了字符的UTF-8编码。

trans-unit.source: Encodes a URI by replacing each instance of certain characters by one, two, three, or four escape sequences representing the UTF-8 encoding of the character.

trans-unit.source: Exact names, wildcard names starting with an asterisk, and wildcard names ending with an asterisk are stored in three hash tables bound to the listen ports. The sizes of hash tables are optimized at the configuration phase so that a name can be found with the fewest CPU cache misses. The details of setting up hash tables are provided in a separate document.

trans-unit.source: Except for the nginx master process, all nginx processes do I/O and so have an event loop. (The nginx master process instead spends most of its time in the sigsuspend() call waiting for signals to arrive.) The nginx event loop is implemented in the ngx_process_events_and_timers() function, which is called repeatedly until the process exits.
trans-unit.target: 除了nginx主进程外，所有nginx进程都执行I / O，因此具有事件循环。（nginx主进程将大部分时间都花在 sigsuspend() 调用中，以等待信号到达。）nginx事件循环是在 ngx_process_events_and_timers() 函数中实现的，该函数会反复调用直到该进程退出。

trans-unit.source: Expire timers by calling ngx_event_expire_timers(). The timer tree is iterated from the leftmost element to the right until an unexpired timeout is found. For each expired node the timedout event flag is set, the timer_set flag is reset, and the event handler is called
trans-unit.target: 通过调用 ngx_event_expire_timers() 使计时器过期。计时器树从最左边的元素向右边迭代，直到找到未过期的超时。对于每个过期的节点，将设置 timedout 事件标志，重置 timer_set 标志，并调用事件处理程序

trans-unit.source: Finally, files can be read and sent using multi-threading (1.7.11), without blocking a worker process:

trans-unit.source: Find the timeout that is closest to expiring, by calling ngx_event_find_timer(). This function finds the leftmost node in the timer tree and returns the number of milliseconds until the node expires.
trans-unit.target: 通过调用 ngx_event_find_timer() 查找最接近到期​​的超时。此函数在计时器树中找到最左边的节点，并返回直到该节点到期为止的毫秒数。

trans-unit.source: First of all objs/ngx_auto_config.h file generated by configure should be included, because it defines a number of constants affecting various #ifdef’s. After that, some basic types and definitions like ngx_str_t, ngx_table_elt_t, ngx_uint_t etc. should be put at the beginning of the DTrace script. These definitions are compact, commonly used and unlikely to be frequently changed.

trans-unit.source: For allocating in shared memory, nginx provides the slab pool ngx_slab_pool_t type. A slab pool for allocating memory is automatically created in each nginx shared zone. The pool is located in the beginning of the shared zone and can be accessed by the expression (ngx_slab_pool_t *) shm_zone->shm.addr. To allocate memory in a shared zone, call either ngx_slab_alloc(pool, size) or ngx_slab_calloc(pool, size). To free memory, call ngx_slab_free(pool, p).
trans-unit.target: 为了分配共享内存，nginx提供了平板池 ngx_slab_pool_t 类型。在每个nginx共享区域中都会自动创建一个用于分配内存的平板池。该池位于共享区域的开头，可以通过表达式 (ngx_slab_pool_t *) shm_zone->shm.addr 进行访问。要在共享区域中分配内存，请调用 ngx_slab_alloc(pool, size) 或 ngx_slab_calloc(pool, size) 。要释放内存，请调用 ngx_slab_free(pool, p) 。

trans-unit.source: For dealing with the body of a client request, nginx provides the ngx_http_read_client_request_body(r, post_handler) and ngx_http_discard_request_body(r) functions. The first function reads the request body and makes it available via the request_body request field. The second function instructs nginx to discard (read and ignore) the request body. One of these functions must be called for every request. Normally, the content handler makes the call.
trans-unit.target: 为了处理客户端请求的主体，nginx提供了 ngx_http_read_client_request_body(r, post_handler) 和 ngx_http_discard_request_body(r) 函数。第一个函数读取请求正文，并通过 request_body 请求字段使其可用。第二个函数指示nginx放弃（读取和忽略）请求正文。必须为每个请求调用这些功能之一。通常，内容处理程序会进行调用。

trans-unit.source: For input/output operations, nginx provides the buffer type ngx_buf_t. Normally, it's used to hold data to be written to a destination or read from a source. A buffer can reference data in memory or in a file and it's technically possible for a buffer to reference both at the same time. Memory for the buffer is allocated separately and is not related to the buffer structure ngx_buf_t.

trans-unit.source: For some phases, return codes are treated in a slightly different way. At the content phase, any return code other that NGX_DECLINED is considered a finalization code. Any return code from the location content handlers is considered a finalization code. At the access phase, in satisfy any mode, any return code other than NGX_OK, NGX_DECLINED, NGX_AGAIN, NGX_DONE is considered a denial. If no subsequent access handlers allow or deny access with a different code, the denial code will become the finalization code.
trans-unit.target: 在某些阶段，返回码的处理方式略有不同。在内容阶段， NGX_DECLINED 任何返回码都被视为完成码。来自位置内容处理程序的任何返回代码都被视为完成代码。在访问阶段，在满足任何模式的情况下，除 NGX_OK ， NGX_DECLINED ， NGX_AGAIN ， NGX_DONE 之外的任何返回码均被视为拒绝。如果没有后续的访问处理程序允许或拒绝使用其他代码的访问，则拒绝代码将成为终结代码。

trans-unit.source: HTTP request header fields are passed to a FastCGI server as parameters. In applications and scripts running as FastCGI servers, these parameters are usually made available as environment variables. For example, the “User-Agent” header field is passed as the HTTP_USER_AGENT parameter. In addition to HTTP request header fields, it is possible to pass arbitrary parameters using the fastcgi_param directive.
trans-unit.target: HTTP请求标头字段作为参数传递到FastCGI服务器。在作为FastCGI服务器运行的应用程序和脚本中，这些参数通常可以用作环境变量。例如，“ User-Agent”头字段作为 HTTP_USER_AGENT 参数传递。除了HTTP请求标头字段外，还可以使用fastcgi_param指令传递任意参数。

trans-unit.source: Handling a request “/” is more complex. It is matched by the prefix location “/” only, therefore, it is handled by this location. Then the index directive tests for the existence of index files according to its parameters and the “root /data/www” directive. If the file /data/www/index.html does not exist, and the file /data/www/index.php exists, then the directive does an internal redirect to “/index.php”, and nginx searches the locations again as if the request had been sent by a client. As we saw before, the redirected request will eventually be handled by the FastCGI server.
trans-unit.target: 处理请求“ / ”更为复杂。它仅与前缀位置“ / ” 匹配，因此，由该位置处理。然后，index指令根据其参数和“ root /data/www ”指令测试索引文件的存在。如果文件 /data/www/index.html 不存在，并且文件 /data/www/index.php 存在，则该指令将内部重定向到“ /index.php ”，并且nginx再次搜索位置如果请求是由客户端发送的。如前所述，重定向的请求最终将由FastCGI服务器处理。

trans-unit.source: Here, cf is a pointer to nginx configuration and name points to a string containing the variable name. The function returns NGX_ERROR on error or a valid index otherwise, which is typically stored somewhere in the module's configuration for future use.
trans-unit.target: 此处， cf 是指向nginx配置的指针， name 指向包含变量名称的字符串。该函数将在出错时返回 NGX_ERROR ，否则返回有效索引，该索引通常存储在模块配置中的某个位置，以备将来使用。

trans-unit.source: Here, a client IP address serves as a key. Note that instead of $remote_addr, the $binary_remote_addr variable is used here. The $remote_addr variable’s size can vary from 7 to 15 bytes. The stored state occupies either 32 or 64 bytes of memory on 32-bit platforms and always 64 bytes on 64-bit platforms. The $binary_remote_addr variable’s size is always 4 bytes for IPv4 addresses or 16 bytes for IPv6 addresses. The stored state always occupies 32 or 64 bytes on 32-bit platforms and 64 bytes on 64-bit platforms. One megabyte zone can keep about 32 thousand 32-byte states or about 16 thousand 64-byte states. If the zone storage is exhausted, the server will return the error to all further requests.
trans-unit.target: 在此，客户端IP地址用作密钥。注意，代替 $remote_addr ，在 $binary_remote_addr 变量在这里使用。在 $remote_addr 变量的大小可以从7到15个字节不等。在32位平台上，存储状态占用32或64字节的内存，而在64位平台上则始终占用64字节的内存。在 $binary_remote_addr 变量的大小始终是IPv4地址的4个字节或对IPv6地址的16个字节。在32位平台上，存储状态始终占据32或64字节，在64位平台上，存储状态始终占据64字节。一个1兆字节的区域可以保留大约3.2万个32字节状态或大约1.6万个64字节状态。如果区域存储空间已用完，服务器将把错误返回给所有其他请求。

trans-unit.source: Here, the key is a client IP address set by the $binary_remote_addr variable. The size of $binary_remote_addr is 4 bytes for IPv4 addresses or 16 bytes for IPv6 addresses. The stored state always occupies 32 or 64 bytes on 32-bit platforms and 64 bytes on 64-bit platforms. One megabyte zone can keep about 32 thousand 32-byte states or about 16 thousand 64-byte states. If the zone storage is exhausted, the server will close the connection.
trans-unit.target: 在这里，密钥是由 $binary_remote_addr 变量设置的客户端IP地址。 $binary_remote_addr 的大小对于IPv4地址是4个字节，对于IPv6地址是16个字节。在32位平台上，存储状态始终占据32或64字节，在64位平台上，存储状态始终占据64字节。一个1兆字节的区域可以保留大约3.2万个32字节状态或大约1.6万个64字节状态。如果区域存储已用尽，则服务器将关闭连接。

trans-unit.source: Here, the route is taken from the “JSESSIONID” cookie if present in a request. Otherwise, the route from the URI is used.
trans-unit.target: 在此，如果请求中包含该路由，则从“ JSESSIONID ” cookie中获取路由。否则，将使用来自URI的路由。

trans-unit.source: Here, the server name is set to an empty string that will match requests without the “Host” header field, and a special nginx’s non-standard code 444 is returned that closes the connection.
trans-unit.target: 在这里，服务器名称设置为一个空字符串，该字符串将与没有“ Host”标头字段的请求相匹配，并且返回特殊的nginx的非标准代码444，以关闭连接。

trans-unit.source: Here, the states are kept in a 10 megabyte zone “one”, and an average request processing rate for this zone cannot exceed 1 request per second.
trans-unit.target: 这里，状态保持在10兆字节的区域“ 1”中，并且该区域的平均请求处理速率不能超过每秒1个请求。

trans-unit.source: Highest-priority SRV records (records with the same lowest-number priority value) are resolved as primary servers, the rest of SRV records are resolved as backup servers. If the backup parameter is specified for the server, high-priority SRV records are resolved as backup servers, the rest of SRV records are ignored.
trans-unit.target: 最高优先级的SRV记录（具有相同的最低优先级值的记录）被解析为主服务器，其余的SRV记录被解析为备用服务器。如果为服务器指定了备份参数，则将高优先级SRV记录解析为备份服务器，其余的SRV记录将被忽略。

trans-unit.source: If accept_mutex is enabled, specifies the maximum time during which a worker process will try to restart accepting new connections if another worker process is currently accepting new connections.

trans-unit.target: 如果启用了aio，则指定是否将其用于写入文件。当前，这仅在使用 aio threads ，并且仅限于使用从代理服务器接收到的数据写入临时文件。

trans-unit.source: If accept_mutex is enabled, worker processes will accept new connections by turn. Otherwise, all worker processes will be notified about new connections, and if volume of new connections is low, some of the worker processes may just waste system resources.
trans-unit.target: 如果启用 accept_mutex ，工作进程将依次接受新的连接。否则，将通知所有辅助进程有关新连接的信息，如果新连接的数量很少，则某些辅助进程可能只会浪费系统资源。

trans-unit.source: If a health check fails, the server will be considered unhealthy. If several health checks are defined for the same group of servers, a single failure of any check will make the corresponding server be considered unhealthy. Client connections are not passed to unhealthy servers and servers in the “checking” state.
trans-unit.target: 如果运行状况检查失败，则服务器将被视为不正常。如果为同一组服务器定义了多个运行状况检查，则任何一次检查失败都会使相应的服务器不正常。客户端连接不会传递到运行状况不佳的服务器，也不会传递到处于“检查”状态的服务器。

trans-unit.source: If a health check fails, the server will be considered unhealthy. If several health checks are defined for the same group of servers, a single failure of any check will make the corresponding server be considered unhealthy. Client requests are not passed to unhealthy servers and servers in the “checking” state.
trans-unit.target: 如果运行状况检查失败，则服务器将被视为不正常。如果为同一组服务器定义了多个运行状况检查，则任何一次检查失败都会使相应的服务器不正常。客户端请求不会传递给运行状况不佳的服务器，也不会传递给处于“检查”状态的服务器。

trans-unit.source: If a link has a limited lifetime, the expiration time is set in seconds since Epoch (Thu, 01 Jan 1970 00:00:00 GMT). The value is specified in the expression after the MD5 hash, and is separated by a comma. The expiration time passed in a request is available through the $secure_link_expires variable for a use in the secure_link_md5 directive. If the expiration time is not specified, a link has the unlimited lifetime.
trans-unit.target: 如果链接的生存期有限，则自Epoch（星期四，1970年1月1日，格林尼治标准时间1970年1月0日）以来，以秒为单位设置到期时间。该值在MD5哈希之后的表达式中指定，并用逗号分隔。通过 $secure_link_expires 变量可以使用在请求中传递的到期时间，以在secure_link_md5指令中使用。如果未指定到期时间，则链接具有无限的生存期。

In response to a request with URI equal to this string, but without the trailing slash, a permanent redirect with the code 301 will be returned to the requested URI with the slash appended. If this is not desired, an exact match of the URI and location could be defined like this:

trans-unit.source: If a matching request does not include the start and end arguments, there is no overhead, and the file is sent simply as a static resource. Some players also support byte-range requests, and thus do not require this module.

trans-unit.source: If a regular expression includes the “}” or “;” characters, the whole expressions should be enclosed in single or double quotes.

trans-unit.source: If an expression does not fit into single line, it is wrapped. The preferred point to break a line is a binary operator. The continuation line is lined up with the start of expression:
trans-unit.target: 如果一个表达式不适合单行,就会被包装。断行的首选点是二进制运算符。延续行与表达式的起始点对齐。

trans-unit.source: If an upstream server cannot be selected immediately while processing a request, the request will be placed into the queue. The directive specifies the maximum number of requests that can be in the queue at the same time. If the queue is filled up, or the server to pass the request to cannot be selected within the time period specified in the timeout parameter, the 502 (Bad Gateway) error will be returned to the client.
trans-unit.target: 如果在处理请求时无法立即选择上游服务器，则该请求将被放入队列中。伪指令指定可以同时在队列中的最大请求 number 。如果队列已满，或者在 timeout 参数指定的时间段内无法选择将请求传递给的服务器，则会将502（错误网关）错误返回给客户端。

trans-unit.source: If any group or all access permissions are specified then user permissions may be omitted:

trans-unit.target: 如果路径名的任何部分是一个符号链接,则拒绝访问文件。

trans-unit.source: If any of the specified substrings is found in the “User-Agent” request header field, the browser will be considered ancient. The special string “netscape4” corresponds to the regular expression “^Mozilla/[1-4]”.
trans-unit.target: 如果在“ User-Agent”请求标头字段中找到任何指定的子字符串，则该浏览器将被认为是古老的。特殊字符串“ netscape4 ”对应于正则表达式“ ^Mozilla/[1-4] ”。

trans-unit.source: If any parameters are omitted, the corresponding cookie fields are not set.
trans-unit.target: 如果省略任何参数,则不设置相应的cookie字段。

trans-unit.source: If caching is enabled, the header fields “If-Modified-Since”, “If-Unmodified-Since”, “If-None-Match”, “If-Match”, “Range”, and “If-Range” from the original request are not passed to the proxied server.
trans-unit.target: 如果启用了缓存，则标题栏中的字段“ If-Modified-Since”，“ If-Unmodified-Since”，“ If-None-Match”，“ If-Match”，“ Range”和“ If-Range”原始请求不会传递到代理服务器。

trans-unit.source: If delaying of excessive requests while requests are being limited is not desired, the parameter nodelay should be used:
trans-unit.target: 如果不需要在限制请求时延迟过多的请求，则应使用参数 nodelay ：

trans-unit.source: If disabled, redirects issued by nginx will be relative.
trans-unit.target: 如果禁用,nginx发出的重定向将是相对的。

trans-unit.source: If either the buffer or gzip (1.3.10, 1.2.7) parameter is used, writes to log will be buffered.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用 buffer 或 gzip （1.3.10，1.2.7）参数，则将写入日志。

trans-unit.source: If either the buffer or gzip parameter is used, writes to log will be buffered.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用 buffer 或 gzip 参数，则将缓冲对日志的写入。

trans-unit.source: If enabled, final images will be interlaced. For JPEG, final images will be in “progressive JPEG” format.
trans-unit.target: 如果启用，将对最终图像进行隔行扫描。对于JPEG，最终图像将采用“渐进JPEG”格式。

trans-unit.source: If enabled, suppresses the output of the “[an error occurred while processing the directive]” string if an error occurred during SSI processing.
trans-unit.target: 如果启用，如果在SSI处理期间发生 [an error occurred while processing the directive] ，则禁止输出“ [处理指令时发生错误] ”字符串。

trans-unit.source: If identifiers are issued by multiple servers (services), each service should be assigned its own number to ensure that client identifiers are unique. For version 1 cookies, the default value is zero. For version 2 cookies, the default value is the number composed from the last four octets of the server’s IP address.
trans-unit.target: 如果标识符是由多个服务器（服务）发布的，则应为每个服务分配自己的 number 以确保客户端标识符是唯一的。对于版本1 Cookie，默认值为零。对于版本2 Cookie，默认值为从服务器IP地址的最后四个八位字节组成的数字。

trans-unit.target: 如果nginx无法启动并显示错误信息。

trans-unit.source: If no server_name is defined in a server block then nginx uses the empty name as the server name.
trans-unit.target: 如果在服务器块中未定义server_name，则nginx使用空名称作为服务器名称。

trans-unit.source: If no encoding is specified, returns a specified Unicode string or byte string as in ECMAScript.
trans-unit.target: 如果未指定 encoding 则如ECMAScript中一样返回指定的Unicode字符串或字节字符串。

trans-unit.source: If not disabled, processing of these header fields has the following effect:

trans-unit.source: If one of the servers needs to be temporarily removed, it should be marked with the down parameter in order to preserve the current hashing of client IP addresses.
trans-unit.target: 如果其中一台服务器需要临时删除，则应使用 down 参数对其进行标记，以保留客户端IP地址的当前哈希值。

trans-unit.source: If only address is given, the port 80 is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果仅给出 address ，则使用端口80。

trans-unit.source: If only caching time is specified
trans-unit.target: 如果仅指定缓存 time

trans-unit.source: If possible, the transmission of client data will be postponed until nginx has at least size bytes of data to send. The zero value disables postponing data transmission.
trans-unit.target: 如果可能的话，客户端数据的传输将被推迟，直到nginx至少有 size 字节的数据要发送。零值禁用延迟数据传输。
